title: Foundations of mathematics
creator_credit: Steve Campus and Steve Campus Productions
brief_description: Designed to show teachers working in the area of infant mathematics possible ways of using concrete equipment with an emphasis on formal pre-number work. Covers classifying and grouping; pattern; counting; equivalence; estimation; measurement; and shape. Suitable for lower primary and tertiary/teacher levels.
